boardgame.name: Kingdom Death: Monster
boardgame.description: Kingdom Death: Monster is a fully cooperative tabletop hobby game experience. Set in a unique nightmarish world devoid of most natural resources, you control a settlement at the dawn of its existence. Fight monsters, craft weapons and gear, and develop your settlement to ensure your survival from generation to generation._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Campaign System_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Embark alone or with up to 3 friends (5 with game variant) on a 5-30-lantern-year campaign, with each year consisting of a cycle of hunt, showdown, and settlement phases. The settlement phase is an intricate civilization building game in which you spend very limited resources to build buildings, research new technologies, train your warriors, and set up your strategy for survival. During the hunt, you'll encounter a series of stories in a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;choose your own adventure_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; style journey through various events and encounters. Finally, when you meet the monster you're pursuing, you'll engage it in an a massive arena-style battle where only one party is going to survive. If your party lives, you'll be able to bring the spoils back home to use in expanding your settlement._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Monster AI System_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each of the 7 monsters included are controlled by their own pair of decks that scale to 3 levels of difficulty (except for the final encounter, which has only 1 level and it's HARD!). Every encounter, even with the same monster, is highly variable and no two showdowns will resolve the same way. Players will have to plan their gear and keep their minds sharp to prevail._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Gear System_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Kingdom Death: Monster, survivors will craft gear from resources earned from defeating monsters or found on their hunt. Each survivor has a 3x3 gear grid. Selection and arrangement of your gear cards is critical, as many provided bonuses and activate special rules when aligned correctly._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Story Event System_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;40+ Story Events plus over 100 hunt encounters will shape and guide your campaign. Story Events detail important evolutions in your civilization, introduce new monsters, and provide rich detail for your campaign. Some will trigger automatically as you progress through the campaign, but most will be entirely based on choices players make._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Story Events cover everything from setting up and fighting a monster to key events that happen within the overall story. Some are triggered directly from the timeline and others from choices you make in game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: for I AM LEGEND: Sale of Kingdom Death: Monster pledge manager login. (original forum post for verification): So...just got laid off at work and looking to bring in a little extra cash. My pledge: Survivor, Domestic Shipping. Paid for addons: Flower Knight Expansion1 Dragon King Expansion1 Gorm Major Expansion (includes Regeneration Suit)1 Dung Beetle Knight Expansion1 Spidicules Major Expansion1 Sunstalker Major Expansion1 Slender Man Expansion1 Promo: Kara Black1 The most recent KS update they have stated that they will be reopening the pledge manager soon, so you could add even more addons if you wanted at that time. The transaction will be conducted through the BGG marketplace to ensure that BGG gets its cut. What you will get: I will provide you with my login and password for the pledge manager (as well as a courtesy link to the PM) allowing you to change the shipping name and address, as well as add additional items when they reopen the pledge manager. I can make no guarantees about being able to change the shipping address from a domestic US address to an international address, so caveat emptor if you do not live in the US. What I am asking: My actual pledged amount was $390. I would like to at least not incur much loss, so I am asking for $420. This means that I will receive $394 after the paypal and BGG cuts. Please PM me if this interests you, or if you would like to make a *reasonable* counteroffer. Repeat for clarity:The transaction will be conducted through the BGG marketplace to ensure that BGG gets its cut. Buyer will be expected to mark the transaction as completed on the BGG marketplace once I message with the login/password. Once I have provided the login/password, I have delivered the promised merchandise. This is a purchase of a kickstarter pledge manager login. Delivery of the final product is an issue for the buyer to take up with the company responsible for fulfillment of the kickstarter rewards. (Picture added for verification)

This listing is for a brand new, unopened, in hand, Survivor level Kickstarter version of the game. The box is almost 22 pounds, quite large and packed with game content; inside is the KS version of the Base Game and the Survivor box of extras. Note the Survivor box is the same size as the separate miniature box inside the Base Game, so it would seem close to as many miniatures are in it as the Base Game so quite an addition to the game. Please see here for exactly what you would be getting, these are the two boxes inside the shipping box: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3kkcxA0FHEE (not my video) Things to keep in mind for this listing: - The base game ONLY is selling for $400USD from Manufacturer, currently OUT OF STOCK - Current exchange for credit card or paypal on $400USD = ~ $545CAD - The Survivor level box is the same size as the separate miniature box inside Core Game - Shipping from USA to Canada will be very costly AND could incur duty, taxes, brokerage fees etc This will be a limited time listing, after which if not sold it will likely be taken down and put up on Fleabay for a somewhat higher price to account for the extra fees they charge. Shipping will be actual cost nothing more, due to high cost of game insurance recommended, signature required mandatory. I did an estimate from Toronto to Ottawa and it was ~$20, surprisingly low. Pick up in GTA available and possible delivery as well. If someone pays cash, Bank Interac or pays paypal fees sale price of game will be reduced to $535.00. Feel free to PM with questions or to get shipping quote.
